mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.NAME, b.head_portrait, a.notice_type, a.notice_content, a.object_id, a.publish_time, c.issue_desc FROM common_notice a LEFT JOIN common_user b ON a.publish_user_id = b.id inner JOIN spec_issue c ON a.object_id = c.id WHERE CONCAT(',',notice_receiver,',') LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT( '%,', #{user_id} ), ',%' ) AND a.notice_type = '3' and a.STATUS = '1' and a.state = '1' and a.is_send = '1' order by a.publish_time desc

SELECT a.id, b.NAME, b.head_portrait, a.notice_type, a.notice_content, a.object_id, a.publish_time, c.desciption FROM common_notice a LEFT JOIN common_user b ON a.publish_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN comm_dyanimic c ON a.object_id = c.id WHERE CONCAT(',',notice_receiver,',') LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT( '%,', #{user_id} ), ',%' ) AND a.notice_type = '4' and a.STATUS = '1' and a.state = '1' and a.is_send = '1' order by a.publish_time desc

SELECT a.id, b.NAME, b.head_portrait, a.notice_type, a.notice_content, a.object_id, a.publish_time, c.goods_name, substring_index(c.img_url,',',1) as img_url, d.mark_url, c.public_time as goods_public_time FROM common_notice a LEFT JOIN common_user b ON a.publish_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN mall_supply c ON a.object_id = c.id LEFT JOIN mall_business_marks d on c.id = d.supply_id WHERE CONCAT(',',notice_receiver,',') LIKE CONCAT( CONCAT( '%,', #{user_id} ), ',%' ) AND a.notice_type = '5' and a.STATUS = '1' and a.state = '1' and a.is_send = '1' order by a.publish_time desc
mapper.update: update common_notice set is_send = '1' where (is_send = '0' or is_send is null) and send_time <= now()
